channel.title: The Max Life Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the home of both the Pastor Brad Max Life Christian Metal Podcast, and The UpThereDownHere Podcast. Pull up the the table and prepare to be fed, inspired, challenged and called into Kingdom serivce!
channel.itunes:summary: Fans of Old-School Christian Rock/Metal Music will enjoy this podcast--as Pastor Brad shares about his music ministry... stories behind his songs... Bible teaching... album reviews and more!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Pastor Brad's Max Life Christian Rock / Metal Music Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Brad Windlan

item.title: 018MaxLifePodcastSHRED
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Pastor Brad features music from his 2005 release SHRED--get ready to be rocked up, shredded, and blessed!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast, Pastor Brad of http://www.guitarjams.net features music from his 2005 instrumental debut, SHRED! If you're a fan of instrumental hard rock---you'll dig this show! And then, as always, Pastor Brad will encourage your heart with a good word from God's Word and updates on the Guitar Jams ministry! Enjoy!
item.description: In this episode, Pastor Brad features music from his 2005 release SHRED--get ready to be rocked up, shredded, and blessed!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: shred, 80s, Christian, metal, instrumental, rock, guitar, Pastor Brad

item.title: 017MaxLifePodcastOutOfTheHellhole
item.itunes:subtitle: The March 2011 Pastor Brad Christian Metal Podcast--Featuring Music from 2004's Out of the Hellhole album.
item.itunes:summary: In this very special episode of the the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast--Pastor Brad shares 3 sneak preview tunes from the soon to be released--SHRED RHEMA... as well as sharing somoe of the music and stories from the 2004 release, Out Of The Hellhole.. enjoy!
item.description: The March 2011 Pastor Brad Christian Metal Podcast--Featuring Music from 2004's Out of the Hellhole album.
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Christian, metal, hair metal, old school metal, rock, Pastor Brad, Max Life

item.title: 016MaxLifePodcastRockYouUp
item.itunes:subtitle: Get ready to be ROCKED UP as Pastor Brad rolls out his Feb episode of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast!
item.itunes:summary: In this special Rock You Up episode of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast, Pastor Brad of http://www.guitarjams.net shares stories and music from his 2004 80s Christian Metal demo release, ROCK YOU UP. This show is packed from start to finish with music, Bible teaching, stories and encouragement!
item.description: Get ready to be ROCKED UP as Pastor Brad rolls out his Feb episode of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Christian metal, 80s, hair metal, Pastor Brad, Bible teaching

item.title: 0015MaxLifePodcastGetReal
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 15 of the Pastor Brad Max Life Christian Metal Podcast. Tune in, rock out, and drink in the spiritual encouragement!
item.itunes:summary: In episode 15 Pastor Brad of http://www.guitarjams.net serves up a smorgasboard of metal music and biblical teaching! You'll hear several Pastor Brad 80s Christian metal tunes from both past and future project... receive updates on the latest happenings in the ministry and receive a serious injection of spiritual encouragement from God's Word!
item.description: Episode 15 of the Pastor Brad Max Life Christian Metal Podcast. Tune in, rock out, and drink in the spiritual encouragement!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: old school, 80s, eightiers, Christian, metal, rock, music, Bible, biblical, teaching, Pastor, Brad

item.title: 014MaxLifeChristmasMetalPodcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Have Metal Christmas and a Head Banging New Year!
item.itunes:summary: In this very special Christmas Podcast Pastor Brad of GuitarJams.Net celebrates the AWESOME message of Christ's Birth---you'll love the message and the monsterous music, as Ronnie James Dio, Dokken, KISS and many many other classic metal artists crank out their versions of your favorite Christmas songs! Enjoy!
item.description: Have Metal Christmas and a Head Banging New Year!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: christmas, metal, rock, pastor brad, christian, podcast

item.title: 013MaxLifeChristianMetalPodcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Pastor Brad's Oct. 2010 Max Life Christian Metal Podcast
item.itunes:summary: Get ready to be rocked and encouraged--as Pastor Brad lays out a challenge from God's Word and cranks out some fresh, 80s style PB Christian Metal. This episode also include an interview Pastor Brad did with Metal For Christ Podcast... in this interview PB talks about the experience of working with Ken Tamplin, Les Carlson and others in recording Break Out... the interview also inclueds a good discussion on the Piracy Issue of today and how file swapping is impacting musicians.
item.description: Pastor Brad's Oct. 2010 Max Life Christian Metal Podcast
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Pastor Brad, Christian Metal, Bible, Christian, rock, Jesus, Bible, faith

item.title: Episode012MaxLifeChristianMetalPodcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Get updated and encouraged and ROCKED! Enjoy!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Pastor Brad of http://www.guitarjams.net updates us on the latest developments with the GJ Mnistry, etc. This episode features, "City Streets" from 2004's "Out Of The Hellhole." And PB shares a message entitled, "Go Fish" -- learning how to fish for people!
item.description: Get updated and encouraged and ROCKED! Enjoy!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan

item.title: Episode011MaxLifeChristianMetalPodcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Pastor Brad rocks out and encourages you with some killer new music and a biblical teaching!
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 11 of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast Pastor Brad of http://www.guitarjams.net share a new Bible Moments teaching entitled, "Lighten Up" -- all about the fact that Jesus said, "Come unto me all you who are heavy burdened and I'll give you rest..." PB also shares a story about crazy moment in his life involving a moped, a BIG wheel and a parked car! And lots more. Tune in and check it out!
item.description: Pastor Brad rocks out and encourages you with some killer new music and a biblical teaching!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Christian, metal, Bible, teaching, faith, Jesus, rock, Pastor Brad, 80s

item.title: Episode010MaxLifeChristianMetalPodcast
item.itunes:subtitle: The April episode--featuring new PB Christian metal music, Bible teaching and LOTS more!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast, Pastor Brad of http://www.guitarjams.net features two songs from his brand new album, BREAK OUT... You'll here a powerful Bible teaching called the "Prodigal God"... get updates on the new Metal Devotional, meet the newly formed Pastor Brad Band and LOADS more! Enjoy!
item.description: The April episode--featuring new PB Christian metal music, Bible teaching and LOTS more!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Pastor Brad
item.itunes:keywords: Christian metal, music, Pastor Brad, Max Life, heavy metal, metal, rock, guitar, guitar lessons, Bible teaching, faith

item.title: Episode009MaxLifeChristianMetalPodcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Dude--I JUST finished mixing BREAK OUT!
item.itunes:summary: I recorded this at the end of a long 48 hour period of mixing BREAK OUT. As a matter of fact--the final tracks were beng sent over the web--to the mastering engineer--as I recorded it. I was pretty fried a probably a bit punch drunk :-) But it was fun to record. I've got some cool announcements in here--and a great BIBLE MOMENTS called, "Humility--the back door to greatness". Enjoy!
item.description: Dude--I JUST finished mixing BREAK OUT!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan

item.title: 008MaxLifePodcast0210
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 008 of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast with Pastor Brad--updates, killer music, Bible teaching more!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast Pastor Brad update all PB fans on the upcoming BREAK OUT album... offers up a brand new Bible Moments teaching entitled "Jesu is not politically correct"... shares the story behind the song, "I Will Follow"... offers up a review of Liberty N Justice's new release, LIGHT IT UP... and more.. Jump in and prepare to be rocked for the ROCK!
item.description: Episode 008 of the Max Life Christian Metal Podcast with Pastor Brad--updates, killer music, Bible teaching more!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan

item.title: 007MaxLifePodcast0110
item.itunes:subtitle: Updates, Music, Bible Teaching -- Killer Old School Metal!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Pastor Brad of www.guitarjams.net updates friends and fans on BREAK OUT -- the new album-- to be released in April of 2010. There's a brand new SONG STORY -- featuring the the song "THE WAY" from PB's 2004 release, "OUT OF THE HELLHOLE". A brand new BIBLE MOMENTS teaching -- garanteed to bless and challenge you...and more!
item.description: Updates, Music, Bible Teaching -- Killer Old School Metal!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Pastor Brad
item.itunes:keywords: rock, metal, music, Christain, bible, teaching, faith, Pastor Brad

item.title: 006MaxLifeChristmas09Podcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Pastor Brad's Special Christamas 09 Christian Metal Podcast
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Brad's very special Christmas 2009 Christian Metal Podcast -- including a special 13+ minute preview of the new album, BREAK OUT, a special Christmas Bible Moment's Message, updates on ministry opportunities and much more!
item.description: Pastor Brad's Special Christamas 09 Christian Metal Podcast
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Christimas, Pastor Brad, Christian, Metal, old school, 80s, music, shred, guitar

item.title: 005MaxLifePodcast1009
item.itunes:subtitle: Heavy Metal Pastor, Pastor Brad shares about his music ministry, and metal!
item.itunes:summary: If you dig metal music and jesus is your Savior... you will love this podcast! In this episode, Pastor Brad of www.guitarjams.net, shares about new gear, the Oct. 1 Stryper Show in Greensburg, Pennsylvania, the new album coming out in March of 2010, being signed by Roxx Records and lots more! You'll hear a new Bible Moments teaching -- all about TRUTH, and the fact that God is the ultimate authority for our lives. Dive in bro--Like I said at the beginning...if you enjoy metal music and Jesus is your Savior--you will love this podcast!
item.description: Heavy Metal Pastor, Pastor Brad shares about his music ministry, and metal!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: heavy metal, 80s, eighties, hard, rock, Christian, faith, Bible, teaching, Pastor Brad

item.title: 004MaxLifePodcast0909
item.itunes:subtitle: A Power-Packed programs of Christian Metal and Spiritual encouragemnet!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Pastor Brad of www.guitarjams.net, shares what's currently happening with the Guitar Jams/Pastor Brad Metal Ministry... the story behind the song, "The Invitation" (from PB's 04 release, OUT OF THE HELLHOLE), a review of THRESHER'S "Here I Am"... and a metal devotional that will encourage and inspire your faith!
item.description: A Power-Packed programs of Christian Metal and Spiritual encouragemnet!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Christian, metal, 80s, old school, hair metal, Jesus, faith, Bible, teaching, Pastor Brad, guitar, shred

item.title: 003MaxLifePodcast0809
item.itunes:subtitle: New news, updates, music and Bible teaching from Pastor Brad!
item.itunes:summary: In this hard rockin episode you'll get Pastor Brad's Cornstone Videos... the story behind the song, WELL DONE... a huge announcement about an awesome new radio show called STRICTLY STRYPER that PB is proud to be associated with... updates on the ministry... a brand new Bible Moments segment and just a ton more! If you love Jesus and Metal music---you're gonna dig this episode!
item.description: New news, updates, music and Bible teaching from Pastor Brad!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Brad Windlan
item.itunes:keywords: Christian, metal, 80s, old school, hair metal, Jesus, faith, Bible, teaching, Pastor Brad, guitar, shred

item.title: 002MaxLifePodcast0709
item.itunes:subtitle: The latest on PB's Christian Rock/Metal Music and Ministry...
item.itunes:summary: In episode 002 Pastor Brad reflects on playing CORNERSTONE FEST--lessons he learned from the experience... You'll hear the story behind track #2 on OUT OF THE HELLHOLE, "Frodo and Sam"... and PB shares the very first METAL DEVOTIONAL--a 4 minute devo--based on an inspiring story sent in by Richard Lynch of SAINT. You'll love this episode!
item.description: The latest on PB's Christian Rock/Metal Music and Ministry...
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Pastor Brad
item.itunes:keywords: metal, rock, Christian, music, bible, teaching, faith, Jesus, Pastor Brad

item.title: 001Max Life Podcast
item.itunes:subtitle: 001MaxLifePodcast0609
item.itunes:summary: In episode one, Pastor Brad shares about preparing to play CORNERSTONE FEST... You'll here the story behind the song, "OUT OF THE HELLHOLE" -- and hear the song... next you'll hear a 3 minute "Bible Moment with Pastor Brad" ... and PB closes things out with a review of THEOCRACY's new album--"Mirror of Souls". Enjoy!
item.author: pastorbrad@aol.com (Brad Windlan)
item.itunes:author: Pastor Brad
item.itunes:keywords: rock, metal, music, Christian, Bible, teaching, faith, Jesus, Pastor Brad, ministry
